Assistant.error: I'm sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later.

UnderConstruction.title: Under Construction
UnderConstruction.description: This section is under construction. Please come back later.

messages.text: Looks like you're lucky today. You've found one of the secret entrances to Luckyland.
messages.advice: Can you catch a lucky gem to enter?

messages.text: Catch a lucky gem and you can enter!
messages.advice: Does gems are not easy to catch! Press the lock until you see more gems!

messages.text: You seem persistent. Let's try again!

messages.advice: Remember you only have 3 attempts. Good luck!

messages.text: I think you already know how it works. Let's try again!

ðŸŽ‰ Winner winner chicken dinner! You made it!

Welcome to Luckyland!
messages.advice: Touch the portal to hop in!
Touch the portal and let's earn some treasures!

messages.text: Hello there, you are not allowed to play for a new Lucky Gem yet.
messages.advice: If you have a LuckyPass, you can redeem it here.

select.title: What would you like to do?

welcome.text: Greetings lucky traveler! My name is Jessie, you've been transported to the rabbit hole, you might feel dizzy from the trip. Don't worry, it's normal for newbies passing through the lucky portal.

activate.text: Welcome back lucky traveler! Good to see you again.

locked.text: Welcome back! Your bag is locked.
locked.advice: Use the password you set on this device to unlock it.

mood.text: I'm here to guide you through Luckyland. You'll find many treasures and challenges along the way. How are you feeling today?

select.title: Select your mood
select.options: Ready to WIN, Eager to claim treasures, Calm and Cautious, Excited and Lucky

lucky.text: Awesome, I'm also excited to have new lucky ones in this place, it's been quite lonely lately. This place is not for everyone, Luck can drive you crazy that's why you are only allowed to be here for a certain amount of time.

pass.text: To claim treasures you need a LuckyPass. As you proven to be lucky, you've been granted one.
pass.advice: This pass will allow you to enter the realms of Luckyland.

select.title: What would you like to do?
select.options: Claim treasures, I'll be back later

later.text: No worries, you can return whenever you want.

select.title: What would you like to do?
select.options: I changed my mind, Send it to me, I'll save it

timer.text: This is your countdown timer, it shows how much time your LuckyPass has left. When you activate it, you'll have 60 minutes to explore Luckyland and claim your treasures.
timer.advice: Don't worry, if you are lucky enough --which it seems you are-- you could get at the end of your journey another LuckyPass.

bag.text: Every LuckyPass is unique and can only be used once. Be careful, if you lose it, there's no way to recover it.
bag.advice: Let's set up your LuckyBag so you can get your LuckyPass and some welcome gifts for this journey.

generated.text: Great! Here is your LuckyBag. Keep it safe, you will only receive your key once.
generated.advice: You can use this key to recover it or connect it to another device or app.

select.title: How would you like to save your PRIVATE KEY?
select.options: Download it, Copy it, Secure cloud storage

secure.text: As a final step we need to secure your device.
secure.advice: This password will be required to login on this device only.

gifts.text: Congratulations! Now that your lucky bag is ready to claim these treasures and you are ready for the fun, let's begin with our journey.
gifts.advice: As a welcome gift, you can get some free lucky shots. Would you like to get them?

select.title: What would you like to do?
select.options: Yes! what do I need to do?, I'll buy my lucky shots.

claim.text: Your LuckyBag is ready. You can now activate your LuckyPass.
claim.advice: Once you, activate it, you'll have 60 minutes to explore Luckyland and claim your treasures.

select.title: What would you like to do?
select.options: Activate my LuckyPass, I'll be back later

see-you.advice: Remember, you can always come back to Luckyland and claim your treasures.

continue.text: Uff, just in time! You can continue your journey in Luckyland.
continue.advice: Move forward and claim your treasures!

pass-sale.text: Great Journey! You have completed your LuckyPass. You can get a new one in the store or wait for your next lucky gem.

Store.title: Store
Store.description: Get your Lucky Shots and claim your treasures!

welcome.text: Greetings lucky traveler! My name is Clover, and I'm here to assist you. You've been transported to the LuckyStore.
welcome.advice: This is the place where you can buy $LS (Lucky Shots) and claim your gifts

intro.text: I see you have a special entry to Luckyland! Before you start exploring, you will need some $LS to claim your treasures.

buy.text: Great choice! Here are the $LS packages available for purchase.
buy.advice: Select the package that best suits your needs.

activate.text: You need to activate you LuckyBag to continue.

locked.text: Ups! It seems your LuckyBag is locked

welcome.text: Greetings lucky traveler! I'm Emili, your guide through the realms of Luckyland. You have been transported to the realms portal.
welcome.advice: This is where you can explore the different realms of Luckyland.

first.text: As a first-time visitor, you have only one realm available. New realms will be unlocked as you progress through Luckyland.
first.advice: By entering a realm, your lucky pass will be activated. You can move between realms you have already unlocked.

expired.text: Awesome journey! Your LuckyPass has expired.
expired.advice: You can get a new one in the store or wait for your next lucky gem.

coin.title: Coin Realm
coin.description: Welcome to the Coin Realm! Here you can earn treasures by flipping coins.

activate.text: You need to activate you LuckyBag to continue.

locked.text: Ups! It seems your LuckyBag is locked

welcome.text: Congratulations! You are now in the Coin Realm. Here you can earn treasures by flipping coins.
welcome.advice: This is the first of the many realms you can explore in Luckyland.

buy.text: I'm glad you're enjoying the Coin Realm. You got out of ammo. You need to refill your bag to continue.
buy.advice: Please, take into account this is the most expensive realm, and the others also have bigger rewards.

description.available: You have an active Lucky Pass. You can override it by clicking the button below.
description.clear: You have an active Lucky Pass. You can override it by entering a new code.

type.available: Click to redeem your Lucky Pass
type.clear: You can redeem your Lucky Pass here. If you have a Lucky Pass, please enter the code below.

pre-sale.title: Phase 1: Pre-Sale
goals: Develop and launch the minimum viable product (MVP).
Build a committed community of investors and users from the start.
Raise initial funds for the project deployment.

milestones.title: MVP Launch
tasks: Develop and launch a basic version of the platform on DevNet to showcase the team's capabilities and the project's vision.
Demonstrate key functionalities to help users understand the project's potential.

milestones.title: Pre-Sale Start
tasks: Offer 17.5% of the total LUCK supply for early sale.
Encourage participation in the pre-sale through discounts and exclusive benefits for early investors.

milestones.title: Community Building
tasks: Start building a community around LuckyLand, using social platforms, forums, and marketing campaigns.
Encourage investor participation in shaping and improving the project through a DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization).
Organize events and activities to promote community engagement and commitment.

milestones.title: Pre-Sale Completion
tasks: Complete the pre-sale once 17.5% of the LUCK supply is sold or after a set time period.
Prepare for the projectâ€™s deployment on MainNet and establish liquidity pools on decentralized exchanges.

launch.title: Phase 2: Launch
goals: Initiate full platform operations with community participation.
Open the first realms and games so users can start earning treasures.
Activate the main `LUCK` token on DEXs.
Launch the governance token (LUCKY).
Distribute initial airdrops and rewards.
Run promotion and marketing campaigns to attract new users.

milestones.title: MainNet Deployment
tasks: Migrate the platform from DevNet to MainNet.
Set up liquidity pools on decentralized and centralized exchanges.
Deploy the governance token and activate the airdrop contract.

milestones.title: First Realm Launch
tasks: Start with the Coin Realm and the first available games in LuckyLand.
Distribute the first airdrop of 42.5% of the total LUCK supply through the games.
Incentivize participation by approximately 2,000 users by giving away 64,000 LUCKYSHOT as an initial promotion.

milestones.title: Promotions and Discounts
tasks: Offer promotional packages with discounts on LUCKYSHOT for early users participating in the platform.
Monitor and adjust promotions based on demand and participation.

milestones.title: Second Realm Opening
tasks: Introduce the Dice Realm, with new rewards and challenges.
Encourage treasure collection through active community participation.

milestones.title: Continuous Expansion
tasks: Repeat the cycle of opening and closing realms, starting with the Card Realm and finally the Slot Machines Realm.
Ensure each realm offers more valuable treasures and more complex challenges than the previous one.

expansion.title: Phase 3: Expansion
goals: Introduce new features and games to keep the community engaged and interested.
Expand the platform beyond the initial games.

milestones.title: New Game Development
tasks: Develop and launch new games such as roulette, poker, and other challenges.
Integrate these games into the platform, offering new ways to earn LUCK.

milestones.title: Special Events
tasks: Organize special events and tournaments to encourage participation and competition among users.
Offer exclusive prizes and additional rewards for event winners.

milestones.title: Referral Program
tasks: Launch a referral program to encourage users to invite their friends and family to join LuckyLand.
Reward users who refer new players with LUCKYSHOT and other prizes.

milestones.title: Platform Expansion
tasks: Open the platform to the community for participation in creating new realms and games.
Facilitate participation through the DAO, allowing users to propose and vote on new features.

milestones.title: DAO Integration
tasks: Activate the governance token, enabling users to influence key project decisions.
Use this token as a tool to expand the community and increase LuckyLand's visibility.

probability.title: Phase 4: Probability Manipulation
goals: Integrate NFTs within the platform, allowing users to personalize their gaming experience.
Introduce gameplay mechanics that allow players to increase their chances of winning.

milestones.title: NFT Launch
tasks: Allow users to mint their Lucky Companions, unique NFTs with special abilities.
Ensure the uniqueness of each NFT through a generation process based on the user's wallet address.

milestones.title: NFT Integration in Games
tasks: Implement NFT abilities in the games, enabling users to improve their chances of success.
Expand NFT functionality so they can be used in different types of games.

milestones.title: NFT Marketplace
tasks: Create a closed marketplace where users can trade their NFTs.
Ensure that only users committed to the community can access this marketplace.

milestones.title: Special Events
tasks: Organize special events and tournaments requiring active player participation.
Offer exclusive prizes and additional rewards for event winners.
Integrate NFTs into these events, allowing players to use their special abilities to increase their chances of winning.

airdrops.title: Phase 5: Airdrops
goals: Enable other cryptocurrency projects to use the platform for controlled airdrops.
Incentivize community participation through rewards and special prizes.
Launch marketing and promotional campaigns to promote LuckyLand's recent integration with other projects.

milestones.title: Platform Opening for Airdrops
tasks: Allow other projects to use LuckyLand's infrastructure for airdrops.
Establish rules and standards to ensure the quality and value of distributed tokens.

milestones.title: Project Evaluation and Selection
tasks: Implement an evaluation process to select projects that can perform airdrops on LuckyLand.
Promote transparency and quality in the distribution of these tokens.

milestones.title: Ecosystem Expansion
tasks: Use airdrops from other projects to attract new communities to LuckyLand.
Expand the user base and increase the project's visibility.

multiplayer.title: Phase 6: Multiplayer Games
goals: Expand LuckyLand's game offerings to include multiplayer modes.
Encourage interaction and competition among players, creating an active and engaged community.

milestones.title: Multiplayer Game Development
tasks: Introduce multiplayer games like poker, ludo, and others where users can compete against each other.
Ensure these games are fully auditable and fair.

milestones.title: Betting and Rewards Integration
tasks: Allow users to place bets in multiplayer games using LUCK and LUCKYSHOT.
Distribute rewards fairly and transparently, based on player performance.

milestones.title: League and Tournament Creation
tasks: Organize leagues and tournaments that incentivize competition and keep the community engaged.
Offer special rewards for winners of these events.

realms.title: Phase 7: Realms
goals: Expand LuckyLand by creating new realms and allowing other projects to build on the platform.
Create a diverse and exciting gaming experience for users.
Encourage exploration and active participation on the platform.

milestones.title: New Realm Development
tasks: Create and launch new realms within LuckyLand, each with its own unique theme and challenges.
Ensure each realm offers new opportunities to earn LUCK and engage with the platform.

milestones.title: External Project Integration
tasks: Allow other projects to use LuckyLand's core to build their own games and realms.
Facilitate interoperability between LuckyLand and other platforms.

milestones.title: Continuous Expansion
tasks: Continue expanding LuckyLand with new realms and features, ensuring the platform remains relevant and attractive to users.

welcome.text: Greetings lucky traveler! My name is Lucky, and I'm here to help you. You are in the Tokenomics section of Luckyland.
welcome.advice: Here you can find information about the economy of our world and how it is used to improve yours.

select.title: What would you like to do?
select.options: View the supply, View the distribution, View the use, FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions), I want to ask

MaxReached.title: Congratulations! Your bag is full of $LUCK for this stage. Come back soon!
MaxReached.advice: Your wallet will be extended for the next stages.

Active.title: Active Presale
Active.description: The Luckyland presale is active. Take advantage of this opportunity to get LUCK at a special price.

Planned.title: The presale has not started yet

welcome.text: Wonderful to see you here! My name is Lucky, and I'm here to guide you through the Presale section of Luckyland.
welcome.advice: The early access is a limited offer, so make sure to join before it's too late.

select.title: What would you like to do?
select.options: Go to Presale, Check Tokenomics, Check Roadmap, I want to ask
